.. _`cs-web-components-base-components.ProgressBar.__default__`:

===========
ProgressBar
===========

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========

A ``ProcessBar`` shows progress in percent.

+------------------+--------------+--------------+---------------------------------------------+
| Property         | Type         | Default      | Use                                         |
+==================+==============+==============+=============================================+
| value            | number       | -            | The progress value in percent               |
+------------------+--------------+--------------+---------------------------------------------+
| hideLabel        | bool         | -            | Hide the label text                         |
+------------------+--------------+--------------+---------------------------------------------+
